attributes.action: Give the English public equal voting rights as those in the rest of the UK.
attributes.background: The English public should be allowed equally to vote in, Northern Ireland, Wales, and Scottish, referendums that are within the Parliaments of the United Kingdom as the English public are currently discriminated against and not given an even vote.

rejection.details: If you would like all British citizens to be entitled to vote in any referendum held in any part of the UK, you could start a new petition asking for that.
